GSD.description: A vulnerability has been found in SourceCodester Event Registration System 1.0 and classified as problematic. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /event/admin/?page=user/list. The manipulation of the argument First Name/Last Name leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-214591.
